question: It is a miniature satellite providing weather forecasting, cyclone prediction, and tracking services to India. It has been developed by ISRO Satellite Centre. The data generated by this mini-satellite will be used by NASA, EUMETSAT and NOAA. This satellite is capable of measuring the wind speed and its direction over the ocean and can predict the formation of cyclones in about 4-5 days in advance. The name of the satellite is _?
explanation: SCATSAT-1 is a miniature satellite providing weather forecasting, cyclone prediction, and tracking services to India. It has been developed by ISRO Satellite Centre. The data generated by this mini-satellite will be used by NASA, EUMETSAT and NOAA. The satellite is capable of measuring the wind speed and its direction over the ocean and can predict formation of cyclones in about 4-5 days in advance. The satellite was launched on September 26, 2016 and launched by PSLV-C35 the first multi-burn technology used by ISRO.
